navbar.serve: npx cross-env PORT=8081 PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:8081/ npm run serve

vue-app.serve: npx cross-env PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:8084/ npm run serve -- --port 8084 --public=http://localhost:8084

react-app.serve: npx cross-env PUBLIC_URL=//localhost:8083/ BROWSER=none PORT=8083 WDS_SOCKET_PORT=8083 npm start
